call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - November 28th 2024

commitments.commitment: Twitter spaces with House of Chimera tomorrow with kushti, qx(), and Joe representing Ergo
commitments.quote: One with House of Chimera, so it will be announced later today... Yeah, so you will be there, supposedly... Yeah, and Joe also will be there.

commitments.commitment: Public testnet activation in two weeks for EIP-50
commitments.quote: So for public testnet, I think we can do activation like two weeks, literally two weeks.

commitments.commitment: Will propose public testnet activation and talk with miners about mainnet activation details
commitments.quote: Then we'll propose public testnet activation and then at the same time we can talk with miners about mainnet activation details.

commitments.commitment: First piece of Ergo book likely to be published this week
commitments.quote: the first piece likely will be published this week so just a few days after 6.0 proposal

commitments.commitment: Will create SigmaUSD to Dexy Gold liquidity pool
commitments.quote: So yeah, well, I will do that. So I even tried, but got some errors before because of something with Spectrum DEX chainbots... So yeah, need to try again.

commitments.commitment: Going to Argentina on Sunday for two weeks continuation of work
commitments.quote: I'm actually going to Argentina on Sunday again for two weeks this time.
You'll see we got a big unveiling happening next week.

open_questions.question: Need to check with Explorer team about testnet explorer status
open_questions.context: Testnet explorer needs to point to new testnet for EIP-50 testing

open_questions.question: Need to consider what to do after 6.0 from mid 2025 onwards
open_questions.context: Planning development roadmap beyond current soft fork

key_facts.fact: EIP-50 for 6.0 soft fork proposal published with one pull request left and first round of reviewing done
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: 90 plus percent of hash rate voting needed for approval in Ergo
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: After voting begins, at least three months needed for activation: 32 epochs for voting plus 32 epochs delay, totaling 64 epochs of 1024 blocks each
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Bounty assigned for range proof validation example completion
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Storage rent maximum rate is 2x of default current value that miners can set
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Storage rent activates after four years in block time for unused UTXOs
key_facts.speaker: qx()
